text: 'in aladhin jahaduu bhdha alquran wkdhdhabu bih hin ja'ahum halkwn wmedhdhabwn, wa'iin hdha alquran lakitab eaziz b'iezaz allah 'iiaah whfzh lah min kuli taghyir 'aw tbdyl, laa yatih albatil min 'ayi nahiat min nwahyh wala ybtlh shy', fahu mahfuz min 'an yunqs mnh, 'aw yzad fyh, tanzil min hakim btdbyr 'umur ebadh, mahmud ealaa ma lah min sifat alkmal
